data.name: piglot
data.description: A package for the optimisation of numerical responses

evidence: "Welcome to `piglot`, a Python tool taylored for the automated optimisation of responses from numerical solvers."

"We aim to provide a simple and user-friendly interface that is also easily extendable, allowing integration with other solvers within the community." and usage via `piglot` and `piglot-plot` command-line tools indicates an end-user application for optimisation workflows.

"You can install `piglot` ... 1. In your favourite terminal, run: `pip install piglot`;" and the PyPI badge `[![PyPI - Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/piglot)](https://pypi.org/project/piglot/)` indicating distribution via PyPI.
